sourceMeaningMnemonic: You use a <radical>roof</radical> to keep yourself <radical>dry</radical> and safe from <kanji>outer space</kanji>. Look outside, above your roof, and you'll see outer space stretching above you.
meaningInfo: You don't want to float up into outer space and get all wet, do you? No? Then you better make sure you have a roof above your head.
readingMnemonic: Why isn't it dry in <kanji>outer space</kanji>, you ask? Because of all the <reading>u</reading>ni (<ja>う</ja>) swimming around up there. They have nasty, wet, pointy spikes and they're all over the place.
readingInfo: Look closely up at outer space and you'll see all of the uni floating around up there. They're really dark, so it can be hard to notice them, but I promise you, they're there.
